  • Constructor Details

    • Authentication

      public Authentication() throws IOException, NoSuchAlgorithmException, InvalidKeySpecException
      Creates a new Authentication object.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the public or private key file could not be read from the key path stored in .env
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the RSA algorithm is not supported by the system
      InvalidKeySpecException - if the public or private key file is not a valid RSA key

    • Authentication

      public Authentication(String publicKeyPath, String privateKeyPath) throws IOException, NoSuchAlgorithmException, InvalidKeySpecException
      Creates a new Authentication object with publicKeyPath and privateKeyPath as paths to the private/public encryption key.
      Parameters:
      publicKeyPath - path to the public key
      privateKeyPath - path to the private key
      Throws:
      IOException - if the public or private key file could not be read from the key path stored in .env
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the RSA algorithm is not supported by the system
      InvalidKeySpecException - if the public or private key file is not a valid RSA key

    • Authentication

      public Authentication(RSAPublicKey publicKey, RSAPrivateKey privateKey)
      Creates a new Authentication object with publicKey and privateKey as the private/public encryption key.
      Parameters:
      publicKey - public key
      privateKey - private key

  • Method Details

    • extractTokenFromBearer

      public String extractTokenFromBearer(String bearer) throws InvalidTokenException
      Extracts the token from the bearer string.
      Parameters:
      bearer - The bearer string.
      Returns:
      String The token.
      Throws:
      InvalidTokenException - if the token is invalid

    • createToken

      public String createToken(Map<String,?> payload) throws IOException, NoSuchAlgorithmException, InvalidKeySpecException
      Creates, signs and returns a new RSA256 JSON Web Token with the public key stored at the path given by the environment variable "PUBLIC_KEY_PATH" and the private key stored at the path given by the environment variable "PRIVATE_KEY_PATH". The issuer of the token is StorageSystem.
      Returns:
      String - RSA256 JSON Web Token
      Throws:
      IOException
      NoSuchAlgorithmException
      InvalidKeySpecException

    • verifyToken

      public com.auth0.jwt.interfaces.DecodedJWT verifyToken(String token) throws IOException, NoSuchAlgorithmException, InvalidKeySpecException, com.auth0.jwt.exceptions.JWTVerificationException
      Verify a given token with the public key stored at the path given by the environment variable "PUBLIC_KEY_PATH" and the private key stored at the path given by the environment variable "PRIVATE_KEY_PATH". The issuer must be "StorageSystem", otherwise the token is invalid.
      Parameters:
      token - The token to verify
      Returns:
      DecodedJWT if token is valid, null if token is invalid
      Throws:
      IOException - if key file is not found
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the algorithm is not supported
      InvalidKeySpecException - if the key is invalid
      com.auth0.jwt.exceptions.JWTVerificationException - if token is invalid

    • getRSAPublicKey

      public RSAPublicKey getRSAPublicKey(String keyPath) throws IOException, NoSuchAlgorithmException, InvalidKeySpecException
      Loads a RSA private key from a file
      Parameters:
      keyPath - the path to the key file
      Returns:
      RSAKey the key from the file in keyPath
      Throws:
      IOException - if the key file could not be read
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the algorithm is not supported
      InvalidKeySpecException - if the key specification in the file in keyPath is invalid

    • getRSAPrivateKey

      public RSAPrivateKey getRSAPrivateKey(String keyPath) throws IOException, NoSuchAlgorithmException, InvalidKeySpecException
      Loads a RSA private key from a file
      Parameters:
      keyPath - the path to the key file
      Returns:
      RSAKey the key from the file in keyPath
      Throws:
      IOException - if the key file could not be read
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the algorithm is not supported
      InvalidKeySpecException - if the key specification in the file in keyPath is invalid

    • createRSAKey

      public static void createRSAKey(String publicKeyPath, String privateKeyPath) throws NoSuchAlgorithmException, IOException
      Generates an RSA key pair and saves it to the given path.
      Parameters:
      publicKeyPath - The path to save the key public key to.
      privateKeyPath - The path to save the key private key to.
      Throws:
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - If the RSA algorithm is not supported.
      IOException - If the key pair could not be saved.

    • getPathToPublicKey

      public static String getPathToPublicKey()
      Returns the path to the public key
      Returns:
      String path to public key

      public static String getPathToPrivateKey()
      Returns the path to the private key
